hanzi-su-wiki:
篤

Значения

Добрый, сердечный; ревностный, преданный; тяжёлый, серьёзный

Мнемоника

Погонять коня 馬 бамбуковой 竹 плёткой, более щадящей, чем кожаная.

Варианты

笃
purpleculture_pinyin:
dǔ
serious (illness); sincere; true
серьезная болезнь); искренний; истинный
rtega_mnemonic:
篤篤RS
笃笃		deep, true, sincere, genuine, dangerous
  • sitting on a horse 馬 running through a bamboo bush 竹 can be dangerous and a truely deep experience
purpleculture_examples:
篤信 [ dǔ xìn ]: to believe firmly; devout in one's faith
篤實 [ dǔ shí ]: loyal; sincere; sound
篤厚 [ dǔ hòu ]: honest and generous; magnanimous
篤守 [ dǔ shǒu ]: to comply faithfully; sincerely abiding by
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • ⺮ [ zhú ] bamboo; flute
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
koohiiStory1: A fervent horse doesnt need to be whipped with a bamboo stick during a race, it will go fast by itself.
koohiiStory2: A fervent history otaku rebuild the the Trojan Horse. But since he was Japanese, he used bamboo instead of normal wood.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If someone makes a bamboo horse, you know it's deliberate. You can't accidentally make an entire horse out of bamboo.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Someone sat down and deliberately planned the entire horse out, collected the materials, and made it by hand.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you admire all the deliberate details in this bamboo horse, the ghost of Tokugawa (とく) Ieyasu appears before you! "I deliberately made this horse to show you how important being deliberate is. You should be absolutely certain and decisive about your decisions."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Tokugawa Ieyasu then poofs out of existence and so does the bamboo horse.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the bamboo (⺮) horse (馬) is serious
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " horse " and " bamboo ", it means firmness and solidity. "Poetry·Tang Feng·Jiao Liao": "The reality of Jiao Liao, the fan is surging, and the son of Biqi is huge and strong."

" True " can mean sincerity and loyalty. "Books of the Later Han-Ban Biao Biography": "He will say that the world has not been promoted. It is not the so-called shame and shame? How to keep the way and calm!"

" Tuk " also means thickening and thickening. "The Book of Rites‧The Doctrine of the Mean": "The creatures of the old days must be true to their talents."

" Tuk " also often describes a serious illness. "Historical Records-Biography of Fanju and Cai Ze": "The King Zhao made a strong move to Ying Hou, and Ying Hou was called sick."

"Shu Wen" believes that " benefit " means that the horse is delayed. "Shuowen": "The horse walks late. From the horse, the bamboo sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Pause is like a pause, and the head touches the ground. The horse walks with the chopsticks really and slowly.
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " horse " and " bamboo ", it means firmness and solidity.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「竹」聲，表示堅固、堅實。《詩‧唐風‧椒聊》：「椒聊之實，蕃衍盈匊，彼其之子，碩大且篤。」

　　「篤」可表示誠篤、忠誠。《後漢書‧班彪傳論》：「彼將以世運未弘，非所謂賤焉恥乎？何其守道恬淡之篤也！」

　　「篤」也表示加厚、增厚。《禮記‧中庸》：「故天之生物，必因其材而篤焉。」

　　「篤」也常形容病勢沉重。《史記‧范雎蔡澤列傳》：「昭王彊起應侯，應侯遂稱病篤。」

　　《說文》認為「篤」表示馬行頓遲。《說文》：「馬行頓遲。从馬，竹聲。」段玉裁注：「頓，如頓首，以頭觸地也，馬行箸實而遲緩也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「馬」，「竹」聲，表示堅固、堅實。

Lesson: 54 frameNoV4: 1988 frameNoV6: 2142 Strokes: 16 Jouyou Grade: JH JLPT: 1

從「 馬 」，「 竹 」聲，表示堅固、堅實。《詩‧唐風‧椒聊》：「椒聊之實，蕃衍盈匊，彼其之子，碩大且篤。」 「 篤 」可表示誠篤、忠誠。《後漢書‧班彪傳論》：「彼將以世運未弘，非所謂賤焉恥乎？何其守道恬淡之篤也！」 「 篤 」也表示加厚、增厚。《禮記‧中庸》：「故天之生物，必因其材而篤焉。」 「 篤 」也常形容病勢沉重。《史記‧范雎蔡澤列傳》：「昭王彊起應侯，應侯遂稱病篤。」 《說文》認為「 篤 」表示馬行頓遲。《說文》：「馬行頓遲。从馬，竹聲。」段玉裁注：「頓，如頓首，以頭觸地也，馬行箸實而遲緩也。」
From the sound of " horse" and " bamboo", it means firmness and solidity. "Poetry·Tang Feng·Jiao Liao": "The reality of Jiao Liao, the fan is surging, and the son of Biqi is huge and strong." " True" can mean sincerity and loyalty. "Books of the Later Han-Ban Biao Biography": "He will say that the world has not been promoted. It is not the so-called shame and shame? How to keep the way and calm!" " Tuk" also means thickening and thickening. "The Book of Rites‧The Doctrine of the Mean": "The creatures of the old days must be true to their talents." " Tuk" also often describes a serious illness. "Historical Records-Biography of Fanju and Cai Ze": "The King Zhao made a strong move to Ying Hou, and Ying Hou was called sick." "Shu Wen" believes that " benefit" means that the horse is delayed. "Shuowen": "The horse walks late. From the horse, the bamboo sound." Duan Yucai's note: "Pause is like a pause, and the head touches the ground. The horse walks with the chopsticks really and slowly.

篤字的基本解释

篤
dǔ
见“笃”。

篤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǔ］
［《廣韻》冬毒切，入沃，端。］
“笃1”的繁体字。
(1)马行顿迟。
(2)固；坚实。
(3)诚笃。
(4)加厚；增厚。
(5)深厚。
(6)纯一；专一。参见“篤行”、“篤志”。
(7)甚；达到高度。常形容病势沉重。
(8)切实；确凿。
(9)困；困苦。参见“篤”。
(10)象声词。
(11)通“督”。

篤字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　篤； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页894第29
【廣韻】冬毒切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】都毒切，?音督。【廣韻】厚也。【易·大畜】剛健篤實，輝光日新其德。【書·洛誥】篤前人成烈。【詩·大雅】則篤其慶。【爾雅·釋詁】篤，固也。【疏】物厚者牢固。　又純也。【禮·儒行】篤行而不倦。【註】猶純也，純壹之行。　又馬病也。【說文】馬行頓遲。　又人疾甚曰篤。【史記·范睢傳】應侯遂病稱篤。　又地名。【水經注】平原縣有篤馬河，東北入海五百二十里。　又叶徒對切【楊戲·贊趙到】鎭南祖疆，監軍尚篤。?豫戎任，任自封內。　【正韻】亦作竺。

篤字的源字形

小篆楷体

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǔ］
["Guangyun" Winter poison cuts, enters the world, ends. ]
Traditional characters for "Tuk 1".
(1) The horse is delayed.
(2) Solid; solid.
(3) Sincere.
(4) Thickening; thickening.
(5) Profound.
(6) Pure one; single-minded. See "Following Action", "Following Aspirations".
(7) Very; reach height. Often described as a severe illness.
(8) Practical; conclusive.
(9) Difficulty; hardship. See "Tuk ".
(10) Onomatopoeia.
(11) Through "supervisor".

Name meaning

dǔ
вм. 笃
Radicals: 竹, 馬  (bamboo, horse)
Meaning Mnemonic
If someone makes a bamboo horse, you know it's deliberate. You can't accidentally make an entire horse out of bamboo.
Someone sat down and deliberately planned the entire horse out, collected the materials, and made it by hand.
Reading Mnemonic
As you admire all the deliberate details in this bamboo horse, the ghost of Tokugawa (とく) Ieyasu appears before you! "I deliberately made this horse to show you how important being deliberate is. You should be absolutely certain and decisive about your decisions."
Tokugawa Ieyasu then poofs out of existence and so does the bamboo horse.
